entry.title: microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml - Releases - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.6-preview2

The source code for the version of WinUI 3 in the WinAppSDK 1.6-preview2 is available. 1.6-preview2 is a preview release for the WinAppSDK that includes bug fixes for 1.5 and provides early access to new APIs and features for WinUI 3, System Backdrops, Content, Windowing, Input, and Controls.

Check out our release notes for the list of fixed issues and new APIs in this release.

Download the NuGet package for 1.6-preview2 here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.6.240821007-preview2.
